name: Ornate Tattoo
summary: You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic.
description:
You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic. Choose a 1st-level arcane spell from the same school as your Arcane Tattoos, either a common spell or another to which you have access. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate arcane spell.Ornate Tattoo Leads To...

Virtue-Forged TattoosTraitsHuman: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
